subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Judge Won't Let Libby Be Free During Appeal Process
body:
A federal judge said Thursday he will not delay a 2 1/2-year prison sentence 
for I. Lewis ``Scooter'' Libby, a ruling that could send the former White 
House aide to prison within weeks.
